itemInfo.itemDesc: A necklace decorated with a Sapphire.

item.name: Rough Sapphire
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Rough Sapphire requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Gemstones.

item.name: Gold Ore
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Gold Ore requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Gold.

item.name: Resplendent Sapphire Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Resplendent Sapphire.
